info.description: This is an API for the Web App to be developed that builds on the IMDB Movies Dataset available at Kaggle.
info.title: Web App

get.summary: All the available information about a movie from Kaggle

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The Title of the Movie

parameters.name: imdb_url
parameters.description: The IMDB URL of the Movie

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The Content Type of the Response (JSON/CSV)

results.title: All the Bright Places
results.actors: ['Elle Fanning', 'Justice Smith', 'Alexandra Shipp', "Kelli O'Hara", 'Lamar Johnson', 'Virginia Gardner', 'Felix Mallard', 'Sofia Hasmik', 'Keegan-Michael Key', 'Luke Wilson', 'Chris Grace', 'Sharon Ivers', 'Isabella Fay', 'Nicole Forester', 'Sara Katrenich']
results.description: The story of Violet and Theodore, who meet and change each other's lives forever. As they struggle with the emotional and physical scars of their past, they discover that even the smallest places and moments can mean something.

results.title: The Roads Not Taken
results.actors: ['Javier Bardem', 'Elle Fanning', 'Branka Katic', 'Salma Hayek', 'Dimitri Andreas', 'Katia Mullova-Brind', 'Milena Tscharntke', 'Debora Weston', 'Aaron Joshua', 'Sabina Cameron', 'Griffin Stevens', 'Laura Linney', 'Catherine Levi', 'Ruth Keeling', 'Olan Montgomery']
results.tagline: One Man's Journey Into His Mind
results.description: Sally Potter's film follows a day in the life of Leo (Javier Bardem) and his daughter, Molly (Elle Fanning), as he floats through alternate lives he could have lived, leading Molly to wrestle with her own path as she considers her future.

example.Actors: Dean-Charles Chapman, George MacKay, Daniel Mays, Colin Firth
example.Plot: April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.
